title: Apron, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on satin weave
description: Apron for an altar figure in pink satin embroidered in silver thread in a flower and foliage design. Scattered small detached flower design. Edging of narrow silver lace.
